title: Noise
data:
Some actions produce **noise**, waking [sleeping](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep") monsters in a certain radius. Not all of them are actually auditory in nature, but for the sake of simplicity all are listed here. Most sources of noise do not rouse victims of temporary magical sleep (which is more akin to [paralysis](/wiki/Paralysis "Paralysis") in nature). In general, you should avoid noise when dealing with crowds of naturally-sleeping monsters, such as in [special rooms](/wiki/Special_room "Special room"). The following events produce noise:

| Event                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Radius                                                                                 |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Entering [Fort Ludios](/wiki/Fort_Ludios "Fort Ludios") while [Croesus](/wiki/Croesus "Croesus") is still alive[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)                                                                                                                                       | Entire level                                                                           |
| [Aggravate](/wiki/Aggravate "Aggravate") (monster spell or effect)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                        |
| Entering a [throne room](/wiki/Throne_room "Throne room"), [swamp](/wiki/Swamp "Swamp"), [graveyard](/wiki/Graveyard "Graveyard") or [treasure zoo](/wiki/Treasure_zoo "Treasure zoo") for the first time, without [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")[\[3\]](#cite_note-3) | 1 in 3 chance for each monster on the level                                            |
| [Turning undead](/wiki/Turn_undead "Turn undead")[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Line of sight                                                                          |
| Reading a cursed or confused [scroll of scare monster](/wiki/Scroll_of_scare_monster "Scroll of scare monster")[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                        |
| Using a [drum of earthquake](/wiki/Drum_of_earthquake "Drum of earthquake")[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)                                                                                                                                                                           | 41                                                                                     |
| Using a [leather drum](/wiki/Leather_drum "Leather drum")[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)                                                                                                                                                                                             | 6.3 × sqrt(XL)                                                                         |
| Using a [tooled horn](/wiki/Tooled_horn "Tooled horn")[\[8\]](#cite_note-8) or a [bugle](/wiki/Bugle "Bugle")[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)                                                                                                                                         | 5.5 × sqrt(XL)                                                                         |
| Using a [tin whistle](/wiki/Tin_whistle "Tin whistle")[\[10\]](#cite_note-10) or (50% chance) a cursed [magic whistle](/wiki/Magic_whistle "Magic whistle")[\[11\]](#cite_note-11)                                                                                         | 4.5 × sqrt(XL)                                                                         |
| Ringing a [bell](/wiki/Bell "Bell")[\[12\]](#cite_note-12)                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                        |
| Zapping a [wand](/wiki/Wand_of_digging "Wand of digging") or [spell](/wiki/Spellbook_of_dig "Spellbook of dig") of digging into liquid[\[13\]](#cite_note-13)                                                                                                              |                                                                                        |
| Attempting to dig [iron bars](/wiki/Iron_bars "Iron bars")[\[14\]](#cite_note-14)                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                        |
| [Kicking](/wiki/Kick "Kick")[\[15\]](#cite_note-15)                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                        |
| Attacking while polymorphed into a monster with an [explosion attack](/wiki/Explosion_attack "Explosion attack")[\[16\]](#cite_note-16)                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                        |
| [Forcing](/wiki/Force "Force") a lock with a blunt weapon[\[17\]](#cite_note-17)                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                        |
| Making noise while [fumbling](/wiki/Fumbling "Fumbling")[\[18\]](#cite_note-18)                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                        |
| Triggering an exploding trap on a [door](/wiki/Door "Door")[\[19\]](#cite_note-19) or [container](/wiki/Container "Container")[\[20\]](#cite_note-20)                                                                                                                      |                                                                                        |
| Stepping on a [squeaky board](/wiki/Squeaky_board "Squeaky board")                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 4.5 × sqrt(XL) for you,[\[21\]](#cite_note-21) 6.3 for monsters[\[22\]](#cite_note-22) |
| Applying a [polearm](/wiki/Polearm "Polearm") on a [statue](/wiki/Statue "Statue")[\[23\]](#cite_note-23)                                                                                                                                                                  | 5 around the statue                                                                    |
| [Hurtle](/wiki/Hurtle "Hurtle") into a monster, a wall or other obstruction[\[24\]](#cite_note-24)                                                                                                                                                                         | 3.2 (4.5 for [iron bars](/wiki/Iron_bars "Iron bars")) around the object               |
| Magical explosion ([fireball](/wiki/Spellbook_of_fireball "Spellbook of fireball"), skilled [cone of cold](/wiki/Spellbook_of_cone_of_cold "Spellbook of cone of cold"), destroyed [wand](/wiki/Wand "Wand"))[\[25\]](#cite_note-25)                                       | equal to base damage, but at least 7; quartered if engulfed                            |
| Alchemical explosion[\[26\]](#cite_note-26)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 9                                                                                      |
| Monster attacking you with an [explosion attack](/wiki/Explosion_attack "Explosion attack")[\[27\]](#cite_note-27)                                                                                                                                                         | 7 around the monster                                                                   |
| [Land mine](/wiki/Land_mine "Land mine") explosion[\[28\]](#cite_note-28)                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 20 around the mine                                                                     |
| Monster triggering a [door](/wiki/Door "Door") trap[\[29\]](#cite_note-29)                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 7 around the monster                                                                   |
| Opening a trapped [door](/wiki/Door "Door") with the [Bell of Opening](/wiki/Bell_of_Opening "Bell of Opening")[\[30\]](#cite_note-30)                                                                                                                                     | 11 around the door                                                                     |
| Destroying a [door](/wiki/Door "Door") with [force bolt](/wiki/Spellbook_of_force_bolt "Spellbook of force bolt")[\[31\]](#cite_note-31)                                                                                                                                   | 4.5 (6.3 if trapped) around the door                                                   |
| Destroying a drawbridge[\[32\]](#cite_note-32)                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 22.4 around the drawbridge                                                             |
| A boulder falling into liquid[\[33\]](#cite_note-33)                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 6.3 around the fall                                                                    |
| Rock or boulder from a read [scroll of earth](/wiki/Scroll_of_earth "Scroll of earth") hits a creature[\[34\]](#cite_note-34)                                                                                                                                              | 4 around each hit                                                                      |
| One [rolling boulder](/wiki/Rolling_boulder_trap "Rolling boulder trap") hits another[\[35\]](#cite_note-35)                                                                                                                                                               | 10 around the point of impact                                                          |
| Monster cries after being hit with [holy water](/wiki/Potion_of_holy_water "Potion of holy water")[\[36\]](#cite_note-36)or a [potion of acid](/wiki/Potion_of_acid "Potion of acid")[\[37\]](#cite_note-37)                                                               | 3.2 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster                                           |
| [Gremlin](/wiki/Gremlin "Gremlin") cries after being hit with light[\[38\]](#cite_note-38)                                                                                                                                                                                 | 5.5 around the monster                                                                 |
| Monster growls[\[39\]](#cite_note-39)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 4.2 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster                                           |
| Monster whimpers[\[40\]](#cite_note-40)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 3.5 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster                                           |
| Monster yelps[\[41\]](#cite_note-41)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 2.4 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster                                           |
| [Werecreature](/wiki/Werecreature "Werecreature") howls when chatted to[\[42\]](#cite_note-42)                                                                                                                                                                             | 11 around the monster                                                                  |
| [Giant](/wiki/Giant "Giant") shouts when chatted to[\[43\]](#cite_note-43)                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 7 around the monster                                                                   |
| Any artifact dealing shock damage[\[44\]](#cite_note-44) ([Mjollnir](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir"))                                                                                                                                                                           | 16 around the monster                                                                  |

Walking near a monster without [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") can also wake it up.[\[45\]](#cite_note-45) The monster must be in line of sight and within 10 squares; without [aggravate monster](/wiki/Aggravate_monster "Aggravate monster") there's only a 14% chance per monster move of it waking up. While this is presumably caused by you "making noise", it differs from above events in that the effect is continuous and is applied to each monster separately.

## References

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"). Information on this page may be out of date.

html:
Noise

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Some actions produce noise, waking sleeping monsters in a certain radius. Not all of them are actually auditory in nature, but for the sake of simplicity all are listed here. Most sources of noise do not rouse victims of temporary magical sleep (which is more akin to paralysis in nature). In general, you should avoid noise when dealing with crowds of naturally-sleeping monsters, such as in special rooms. The following events produce noise:

Event Radius
Entering Fort Ludios while Croesus is still alive[1] Entire level
Aggravate (monster spell or effect)[2]
Entering a throne room, swamp, graveyard or treasure zoo for the first time, without stealth[3] 1 in 3 chance for each monster on the level
Turning undead[4] Line of sight
Reading a cursed or confused scroll of scare monster[5]
Using a drum of earthquake[6] 41
Using a leather drum[7] 6.3 × sqrt(XL)
Using a tooled horn[8] or a bugle[9] 5.5 × sqrt(XL)
Using a tin whistle[10] or (50% chance) a cursed magic whistle[11] 4.5 × sqrt(XL)
Ringing a bell[12]
Zapping a wand or spell of digging into liquid[13]
Attempting to dig iron bars[14]
Kicking[15]
Attacking while polymorphed into a monster with an explosion attack[16]
Forcing a lock with a blunt weapon[17]
Making noise while fumbling[18]
Triggering an exploding trap on a door[19] or container[20]
Stepping on a squeaky board 4.5 × sqrt(XL) for you,[21] 6.3 for monsters[22]
Applying a polearm on a statue[23] 5 around the statue
Hurtle into a monster, a wall or other obstruction[24] 3.2 (4.5 for iron bars) around the object
Magical explosion (fireball, skilled cone of cold, destroyed wand)[25] equal to base damage, but at least 7; quartered if engulfed
Alchemical explosion[26] 9
Monster attacking you with an explosion attack[27] 7 around the monster
Land mine explosion[28] 20 around the mine
Monster triggering a door trap[29] 7 around the monster
Opening a trapped door with the Bell of Opening[30] 11 around the door
Destroying a door with force bolt[31] 4.5 (6.3 if trapped) around the door
Destroying a drawbridge[32] 22.4 around the drawbridge
A boulder falling into liquid[33] 6.3 around the fall
Rock or boulder from a read scroll of earth hits a creature[34] 4 around each hit
One rolling boulder hits another[35] 10 around the point of impact
Monster cries after being hit with holy water[36]or a potion of acid[37] 3.2 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
Gremlin cries after being hit with light[38] 5.5 around the monster
Monster growls[39] 4.2 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
Monster whimpers[40] 3.5 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
Monster yelps[41] 2.4 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
Werecreature howls when chatted to[42] 11 around the monster
Giant shouts when chatted to[43] 7 around the monster
Any artifact dealing shock damage[44] (Mjollnir) 16 around the monster

Walking near a monster without stealth can also wake it up.[45] The monster must be in line of sight and within 10 squares; without aggravate monster there's only a 14% chance per monster move of it waking up. While this is presumably caused by you "making noise", it differs from above events in that the effect is continuous and is applied to each monster separately.

References

rawPage:
Some actions produce '''noise''', waking [[sleep]]ing monsters in a certain radius.  Not all of them are actually auditory in nature, but for the sake of simplicity all are listed here.  Most sources of noise do not rouse victims of temporary magical sleep (which is more akin to [[paralysis]] in nature).  In general, you should avoid noise when dealing with crowds of naturally-sleeping monsters, such as in [[special room]]s.  The following events produce noise:

{|class="prettytable"
!Event
!Radius
|-
|Entering [[Fort Ludios]] while [[Croesus]] is still alive{{refsrc|src/do.c|1526|nethack=3.6.1}} ||rowspan=2| Entire level
|-
|[[Aggravate]] (monster spell or effect){{reffunc|wizard.c|aggravate}}
|-
|Entering a [[throne room]], [[swamp]], [[graveyard]] or [[treasure zoo]] for the first time, without [[stealth]]{{refsrc|src/hack.c|2463|nethack=3.6.1}} || 1 in 3 chance for each monster on the level
|-
|[[Turn undead|Turning undead]]{{refsrc|src/pray.c|1967|nethack=3.6.1}} ||rowspan=2| Line of sight
|-
|Reading a cursed or confused [[scroll of scare monster]]{{refsrc|src/read.c|1243|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Using a [[drum of earthquake]]{{refsrc|src/music.c|588|nethack=3.6.1}} || 41
|-
|Using a [[leather drum]]{{refsrc|src/music.c|558|nethack=3.6.1}} || 6.3 × sqrt(XL)
|-
|Using a [[tooled horn]]{{refsrc|src/music.c|563|nethack=3.6.1}} or a [[bugle]]{{refsrc|src/music.c|593|nethack=3.6.1}} || 5.5 × sqrt(XL)
|-
|Using a [[tin whistle]]{{refsrc|src/apply.c|451|nethack=3.6.1}} or (50% chance) a cursed [[magic whistle]]{{refsrc|src/apply.c|468|nethack=3.6.1}} ||rowspan=9| 4.5 × sqrt(XL)
|-
|Ringing a [[bell]]{{refsrc|src/apply.c|1105|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Zapping a [[wand of digging|wand]] or [[spellbook of dig|spell]] of digging into liquid{{refsrc|src/dig.c|787|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Attempting to dig [[iron bars]]{{refsrc|src/dig.c|1073|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|[[Kick]]ing{{refsrc|src/dokick.c|888|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Attacking while polymorphed into a monster with an [[explosion attack]]{{refsrc|src/hack.c|1651|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|[[Force|Forcing]] a lock with a blunt weapon{{refsrc|src/lock.c|249|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Making noise while [[fumbling]]{{refsrc|src/timeout.c|592|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Triggering an exploding trap on a [[door]]{{refsrc|src/trap.c|5019|nethack=3.6.1}} or [[container]]{{refsrc|src/trap.c|4736|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Stepping on a [[squeaky board]] || 4.5 × sqrt(XL) for you,{{refsrc|src/trap.c|1022|nethack=3.6.1}} 6.3 for monsters{{refsrc|src/trap.c|2224|nethack=3.6.1}}
|-
|Applying a [[polearm]] on a [[statue]]{{refsrc|src/apply.c|3027|nethack=3.6.1}} || 5 around the statue
|-
|[[Hurtle]] into a monster, a wall or other obstruction{{reffunc|dothrow.c|hurtle_step}} || 3.2 (4.5 for [[iron bars]]) around the object
|-
|Magical explosion ({{spell of|fireball}}, skilled {{spell of|cone of cold}}, destroyed [[wand]]){{refsrc|src/explode.c|575|nethack=3.6.1}} || equal to base damage, but at least 7; quartered if engulfed
|-
|Alchemical explosion{{refsrc|src/potion.c|1990|nethack=3.6.1}} || 9
|-
|Monster attacking you with an [[explosion attack]]{{refsrc|src/mhitu.c|2066|nethack=3.6.1}} || 7 around the monster
|-
|[[Land mine]] explosion{{refsrc|src/trap.c|1611|nethack=3.6.1}} || 20 around the mine
|-
|Monster triggering a [[door]] trap{{refsrc|src/monmove.c|31|nethack=3.6.1}} || 7 around the monster
|-
|Opening a trapped [[door]] with the [[Bell of Opening]]{{refsrc|src/detect.c|1437|nethack=3.6.1}} || 11 around the door
|-
|Destroying a [[door]] with {{spell of|force bolt}}{{refsrc|src/lock.c|1042|nethack=3.6.1}} || 4.5 (6.3 if trapped) around the door
|-
|Destroying a drawbridge{{refsrc|src/dbridge.c|927|nethack=3.6.1}} || 22.4 around the drawbridge
|-
|A boulder falling into liquid{{refsrc|src/do.c|98|nethack=3.6.1}} || 6.3 around the fall
|-
|Rock or boulder from a read [[scroll of earth]] hits a creature{{refsrc|src/read.c|1746|nethack=3.6.1}} || 4 around each hit
|-
|One [[rolling boulder trap|rolling boulder]] hits another{{refsrc|src/trap.c|1914|nethack=3.6.1}} || 10 around the point of impact
|-
|Monster cries after being hit with {{of|potion|holy water}}{{refsrc|src/potion.c|1464|nethack=3.6.1}}or a [[potion of acid]]{{refsrc|src/potion.c|1503|nethack=3.6.1}} || 3.2 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
|-
|[[Gremlin]] cries after being hit with light{{refsrc|src/uhitm.c|2851|nethack=3.6.1}} || 5.5 around the monster
|-
|Monster growls{{refsrc|src/sounds.c|370|nethack=3.6.1}} || 4.2 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
|-
|Monster whimpers{{refsrc|src/sounds.c|413|nethack=3.6.1}} || 3.5 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
|-
|Monster yelps{{refsrc|src/sounds.c|447|nethack=3.6.1}} || 2.4 × sqrt(monster level) around the monster
|-
|[[Werecreature]] howls when chatted to{{refsrc|src/sounds.c|629|nethack=3.6.1}} || 11 around the monster
|-
|[[Giant]] shouts when chatted to{{refsrc|src/sounds.c|763|nethack=3.6.1}} || 7 around the monster
|-
|Any artifact dealing shock damage{{refsrc|src/artifact.c|1220|nethack=3.6.6}} ([[Mjollnir]]) || 16 around the monster
|}

Walking near a monster without [[stealth]] can also wake it up.{{reffunc|monmove.c|disturb}} The monster must be in line of sight and within 10 squares; without [[aggravate monster]] there's only a 14% chance per monster move of it waking up.  While this is presumably caused by you "making noise", it differs from above events in that the effect is continuous and is applied to each monster separately.
